meta.content: Privacy Policy for Color Shift Realm by MD. NAEEM HASAN — how we collect, use and protect your information.

body.p: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use Color Shift Realm.
When you sign in using Google Sign-In, we may receive basic profile information provided by Google, including:
To provide a consistent experience across devices, we store the following information securely in Firebase Firestore:

ul.li: Your game progress (high scores for different difficulty levels)
Your purchase history (number of purchases and total coins bought)

body.p: All in-app purchases are processed via the Google Play Billing API. We do not collect or store credit card or bank details.

ul.li: Save and sync progress: Keep your coins and scores available across devices.
Process purchases: Validate and deliver purchased virtual items.
Improve gameplay: Analyze scores and usage to balance and improve the game.
Authentication: Prevent unauthorized access to user accounts.

body.p: We use third-party services that may collect data according to their own privacy policies, including:
Please review these services' privacy policies for details about how they handle data.

We retain your account data while your account is active. If you request deletion, we will remove your personal data (email, coins, scores, and associated records) within 7 business days whenever reasonably possible.
Request deletion: To delete your account and all associated data, contact us at naeemh893@gmail.com.

Color Shift Realm is intended for a general audience. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we learn that such information has been collected, we will delete it promptly.
We use industry-standard security measures provided by Google Firebase to protect your data. However, no system is completely secure.
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with a revised "Effective Date".
If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us at: naeemh893@gmail.com
